title: andyasj
author: andyasj
content: I don't know if anyone is interested in a new app on Microsoft Store and Google Play Store.Crypto AIM uses the Robert Lichello algorithm to track prices and suggest market orders for cryptocurrency portfolios.Completely free, no ads.Microsoft: https://apps.microsoft.com/store/detail/crypto-aim/9N7R206D4WPSGoogle: https://play.google.com/store/apps/details?id=uk.softsid.crypto_aimAIM was designed for a stock portfolio but this implementation is specifically designed for crypto investments. It appears that the AIM algorithm is more efficient with more volatile investments and so ought to be well suited to crypto. See 'Sensitivity Analysis of AIM' below.Back-Testing AIM:https://toughnickel.com/personal-finance/robertlichelloAIMSystemSensitivity Analysis of AIM:https://toughnickel.com/personal-finance/Sensitivity-Analysis-of-AIMMore links to AIM articles within the app.
